name: Organization
caption: Small institutions or groups
description: Create multiple portals for your work and projects. Help others understand and access your data.

features.name: custom_portal
features.label: Branded Portals
features.description: Showcase your research, data, results, and usage metrics by building a custom web portal.

features.name: custom_search_filters
features.label: Custom Search Filters
features.description: Create custom search filters in your portal to allow scientists to search your holdings using filters appropriate to your field of science.

features.name: fair_data_assessment
features.label: FAIR Data Assessments
features.description: Access quality metric reports using the FAIR data suite of checks.

features.name: custom_quality_metrics
features.label: Custom Quality Metrics
features.description: Create a suite of custom quality metadata checks specific to your datasets.

features.name: aggregated_metrics
features.label: Aggregated Metrics
features.description: Access and share reports on aggregated usage metrics such as dataset views, data downloads, and dataset citations.

features.name: dataone_voting_member
features.label: DataONE Voting Member
features.description: Vote on the direction and priorities at DataONE Community meetings.
